title: Episode 43: The Father Wound
description:
The father wound runs deep. Today (father’s day) we’re having an open vulnerable conversation about what it is and how we can heal from it.

Join the SelfHealers Circle Waitlist:

https://theholisticpsychologist.com/waitlist/

PRE-ORDER HOW TO MEET YOURSELF:

https://howtomeetyourself.com/

BUY HOW TO DO THE WORK:

https://www.amazon.com/How-Do-Work-Recognize-Patterns/dp/006301209X

Text Nicole! 215-366-0012

Get my FREE Future Self Journal:

https://theholisticpsychologist.com/
